w-greeting.text:
Hello!
Welcome to .bot's e-commerce assistant. I can help you pay for bills and utilities or purchase essentials goods and sevices!

contact.text: Okay - an agent will be in contact with you shortly. Please type in your request below while you wait.

from.text:
Where are you flying from?
Please type your origin below. You can also choose from the following common cities:

destination.text:
Where are you flying to?
Please type your destination below. You can also choose from the following common cities:

dates.text:
When do you want to travel?
You can type in dates such as Jan 16 to Jan 31.

confirmation.text: Great! Here are your search details:

details.text: Please confirm if your details are correct.

restart.text: Okay, clearing all your previous responses and starting a new search.

date-error.text:
There was an error in parsing the dates you provided.
Please try again and double check for their validity.

end-error.text: The end date of your trip cannot be earlier than your start date - please enter a valid interval!

search.text:
Great!
Please wait as I get flight options for you!

adults.text:
How many adults (12yrs and above) are traveling?
Please type a number below.

children.text:
How many children (2 - 11 yrs) are traveling?
Please type a number below.

infants.text:
How many infants (less than two years) are traveling?
Please type a number below.

response.text: Here are some of the flights available - please click View All to start booking:

no-flights.text:
Unfortunately, we could not get flights to match your criteria!
Please start a new search below.

control.text:
The agent has marked this request as done. If you want to start a new search, please use the main menu.
Thanks!
